title: The Rise of Patriotism in Russia: Survey Insights
content: “Patriotism as a national idea of ​​Russia” was a topic discussed this week at the press center of the Rossiya Segodnya news agency. First, we measured the depth of this very patriotism: a study was conducted by VTsIOM. The level of patriotism in Russia over the past 8 years has increased from 80% in 2016 to 94% in 2024. The telephone survey covered 1.6 thousand respondents over 18 years of age from 80 regions.
